name: Empeopled Midnight Theme
additional_info:
Feel free to message me on Empeopled @PatchesTheHyena.

*Empeopled Slim theme by Valaramech. Search here to find it.

[10/17/15] - lots of minor things. See new screenshots. Probably the final update.

[10/6/15] - Minor color fix for post links.

[10/5/15] - Minor fix for voting arrow colors on snap polls.

[9/23/15] - Fixed broken spacing on main page, fixed colors on notifications page, other minor improvements

[8/26/15] - Minor improvements

[8/22/15] - Fixed voting arrow placement being broken and slight spacing fix for slim option. 

[7/25/15] - Various tweaks to colors and placements.

[7/21/15] - Fixed spacing for voting buttons. Also some slight color tweaks.

[7/14/15] - Fixed early closure to stop it from affecting other sites.

style_setting_options.label: Default - If not using Empeopled Slim*
Slim - Use with Empeopled Slim*
